skills.name: MIST
desc: • Deals magic damage to all enemies
• Magic Burn deals magic damage over time to targets.

skills.name: SWOOP
desc: • Deals magic damage to a single target.
• 35% Chance to Increase Power and Fury Generation.

skills.name: GUARDIAN
desc: Cannot be Stunned, Taunted, Slept, or Frozen (including by unblockable Freeze).
